description: Tracks service's SLO and error budget consumption.

targets.expr: $operation_day_start

WITH(
    catalog_auth_responses = 100 * (1 - exp(-200 * rand())) < 100,
    order_web_errors = 100 * (1 - exp(-200 * rand())) < 100
)

((days_in_month() * 24* 60 * 60) -
running_sum(
    (duration_over_time(catalog_auth_responses[:15s],16s) default
    duration_over_time(order_web_errors[:15s],16s)) or vector (0) ifnot (hour(time()[1h:1h] + timezone_offset("Europe/Moscow")[1h:1h])[1h:1h] < ($operation_day_start))
)) / (days_in_month() * 24* 60 * 60)

WITH(
    catalog_auth_responses = 100 * (1 - exp(-200 * rand())) < 100,
    order_web_errors = 100 * (1 - exp(-200 * rand())) < 100
)

days_in_month() * 24 * ($error_budget) -
(running_sum(
    (duration_over_time(catalog_auth_responses[:15s],16s) default
    duration_over_time(order_web_errors[:15s],16s)) or vector (0) ifnot (hour(time()[1h:1h] + timezone_offset("Europe/Moscow")[1h:1h])[1h:1h] < ($operation_day_start))
)) /60 / 60

WITH(
    catalog_auth_responses = 100 * (1 - exp(-200 * rand())) < 100,
    order_web_errors = 100 * (1 - exp(-200 * rand())) < 100
)

((days_in_month() * 24* 60 * 60) -
running_sum(
    (duration_over_time(catalog_auth_responses[:15s],16s) default
    duration_over_time(smkt_web_errors[:15s],16s)) or vector (0) ifnot (hour(time()[1h:1h] + timezone_offset("Europe/Moscow")[1h:1h])[1h:1h] < ($operation_day_start))
)) / (days_in_month() * 24* 60 * 60)

WITH(
    catalog_auth_responses = 100 * (1 - exp(-200 * rand())) < 100,
    order_web_errors = 100 * (1 - exp(-200 * rand())) < 100
)

days_in_month() * 24 * ($error_budget) -
(running_sum(
    (duration_over_time(catalog_auth_responses[:15s],16s) default
    duration_over_time(order_web_errors[:15s],16s)) or vector (0) ifnot (hour(time()[1h:1h] + timezone_offset("Europe/Moscow")[1h:1h])[1h:1h] < ($operation_day_start))
)) /60 / 60
$operation_day_end

WITH(
    catalog_auth_responses = 100 * (1 - exp(-200 * rand())) < 100,
    order_web_errors = 100 * (1 - exp(-200 * rand())) < 100
)

((days_in_month() * 24* 60 * 60) -
running_sum(
    (duration_over_time(catalog_auth_responses[:15s],16s) default
    duration_over_time(order_web_errors[:15s],16s)) or vector (0) ifnot (hour(time()[1h:1h] + timezone_offset("Europe/Moscow")[1h:1h])[1h:1h] < ($operation_day_start))
)) / (days_in_month() * 24* 60 * 60)

WITH(
    catalog_auth_responses = 100 * (1 - exp(-200 * rand())) < 100,
    order_web_errors = 100 * (1 - exp(-200 * rand())) < 100
)

days_in_month() * 24 * ($error_budget) -
(running_sum(
    (duration_over_time(catalog_auth_responses[:15s],16s) default
    duration_over_time(order_web_errors[:15s],16s)) or vector (0) ifnot (hour(time()[1h:1h] + timezone_offset("Europe/Moscow")[1h:1h])[1h:1h] < ($operation_day_start))
)) /60 / 60
$service_slo_target
days_in_month() * 24 * ($error_budget)

WITH(
    catalog_auth_responses = 100 * (1 - exp(-200 * rand())) < 100,
    order_web_errors = 100 * (1 - exp(-200 * rand())) < 100
)

((days_in_month() * 24* 60 * 60) -
running_sum(
    (duration_over_time(catalog_auth_responses[:15s],16s) default
    duration_over_time(smkt_web_errors[:15s],16s)) or vector (0) ifnot (hour(time()[1h:1h] + timezone_offset("Europe/Moscow")[1h:1h])[1h:1h] < ($operation_day_start))
)) / (days_in_month() * 24* 60 * 60)

WITH(
    catalog_auth_responses = 100 * (1 - exp(-200 * rand())) < 100,
    order_web_errors = 100 * (1 - exp(-200 * rand())) < 100
)

((days_in_month() * 24* 60 * 60) -
running_sum(
    (duration_over_time(catalog_auth_responses[:15s],16s) default
    duration_over_time(smkt_web_errors[:15s],16s)) or vector (0) ifnot (hour(time()[1h:1h] + timezone_offset("Europe/Moscow")[1h:1h])[1h:1h] < ($operation_day_start))
)) / (days_in_month() * 24* 60 * 60)

panels.title: Burn rate 1 week
